name: Dev Container
onCreateCommand: cd $CONTAINER_FOLDER && npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event onCreate ${devcontainerId} &&  pnpm run --silent dc-onCreateCommand
updateContentCommand: cd $CONTAINER_FOLDER && npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event updateContent ${devcontainerId} && pnpm run --silent dc-updateContentCommand
postCreateCommand: cd $CONTAINER_FOLDER && npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event postCreate ${devcontainerId} && pnpm run --silent dc-postCreateCommand
postAttachCommand: cd $CONTAINER_FOLDER && npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event postAttach ${devcontainerId} && pnpm run --silent dc-postAttachCommand
postStartCommand: cd $CONTAINER_FOLDER && npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event postStart ${devcontainerId} && pnpm run --silent dc-postStartCommand
